name: Mr Slime has Trouble Gardening!
description:
PLEASE NOTE: WEBGL VERSION IS LACKING SOME VISUAL EFFECTS FOR SOME REASON, TRY TO PLAY THE DOWNLOAD VERSION!

Mr Slime is in dire need of some cash! Help him by fufilling orders of monsterous plants that try to kill the farmer! As Mr Slime gains more reputation, more and more plants can get requested and his wage will increase, but be careful, reaching 0 reputation will get you fired!

WASD to move

Left click to pick up plants

Right click to shoot water

Update (?) sorta, just had to fix an error causing the game to be a lot easier
